title: Sol pechu ketkadha lyrics Thillalangadi  Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Movie : Thillalangadi
Artists : Yuvan, Chitra, Shreya Goshal
Lyrics : Na Muthukumar

---Chitra --Â 
Sol pechu ketkadha sundhariye
Nillendral nikkamal thulluriye
Neyaga poipesa pogiriye
Minsaram meley poi-modhuriye

Emandhupogahey emathipogathey
Algana aabathil maaitikondu pogadhey
Kanmoodi Yengadhey keilpakam pogathey
Ketukko avandhan Thillangadi

--Shreya Ghosal--
Avan nallapayan thaana illa kettapayan thaana
Theriyalaye Puriyalaye mella edho aanen
Avan kickil sokkiponen irukannil sokki ponen
Pidichirukka pidikalaya yaaraiketka poven

--Yuvan--
Adi penne konjanallai konjalana kobamenna
Nadadhaley un kalgal midhakutha
Nerupaga indha kadhal eriyutha
Idhu enna kadhalaley kooduvitu paigiraye
Vizhiyodu en uruvam theriyudha
Pudhidhaga oru ulagam eriyudha

--Shreya Ghosal --
Bayam bayam adhai ariyaamal selvan avan
Jeyam jeyam endru dhinam dhinam velvan avan
Alagana kallano anbana villano
Adhanaley kadhal yekkam kondayo..
Eppodhum illadha sandhosam Thandhanne
Ayyayyo adhai neeyum kondaayo

Emandhupogahey emathipogathey
Kanmoodi kondey ne sadukudu adaadhey

--Shreya Ghosal--
Ange ingum enge parkum podhum avan poomugam
Nenjai alli thooki kondu pogum avan niyabagam
Kathadi polathan kanmoodi parapaane
Penne ne nooluvitu povaaye...
Kannadi nan parhaal mundadi vandhaney
Unikindha kadhal sorgam puriyadhey

En pechu ketkadha sundhariye
Un pechu nanketka thoonduriye ....
